short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A white Mustang with orange rims in a snowy scene, paired with quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the thrill of driving the iconic Ford Mustang GT through a snowy landscape. The car's white body and striking orange rims shine against the winter backdrop, reflecting the power and speed of this legendary machine. 

🎨Atmospheric Design: The contrast between the snowflakes falling and the bold design of the Mustang GT creates a perfect balance of elegance and strength, with the car ready to conquer any terrain. 

⏰ Clock and Date: Keep track of time as you admire the Mustang GT’s powerful presence, ensuring you never miss a moment of the ride. 

🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Access your favorite websites quickly while surrounded by the snowy atmosphere and the Mustang’s commanding presence. 

🎮 Play Games: Dive into browser-based games inspired by the Ford Mustang, adding extra excitement to your browsing experience. 

Google Search Bar: Search efficiently using the search engine of your choice, driving your curiosity just like the Mustang drives on snow. 

🚀 More Extension: Unlock additional features inspired by the Ford Mustang GT to enhance your browsing experience.
